errors.user_limit_reached: User limit reached ({current}/{limit}). Please upgrade your plan or purchase additional users.
errors.case_limit_reached: Case limit reached ({current}/{limit}). Please upgrade your plan or purchase additional cases.
errors.client_limit_reached: Client limit reached ({current}/{limit}). Client limit is equal to your Case limit. Please upgrade your plan or purchase additional cases.
errors.storage_limit_reached: Storage limit would be exceeded. Current: {current}, Limit: {limit}
errors.subscription_expired: Your subscription has expired. Please renew to continue.
